#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

unsigned long long func(unsigned long long n)
{
         if ( n < 1 ) return 0;
         return 1 - n%2 + func(n/2);
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    unsigned long long n,ans;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while ( t-- ) {
          scanf("%llu", &n);
          n--;
          ans = func(n);
          printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
